attributes.action: Say NO to a second EU Referendum vote!
attributes.additional_details: The Leave campaign won the Referendum by 1,269,501 Votes with 71.8% of Britain population taking part. The Leave campaign won the vote fair and square and we all should respect what the British public have voted for! And that is a Brexit.
attributes.background: After a EU Referendum vote on Thursday 23rd of June. After the results were counted the Leave campaign won the Referendum with 51.9% (17,410,742) of the votes compared to the Remain campaign who had 48.1% (16,141,241) of the votes.
